data.name: Academic Dispute
data.oracle_text:
Target creature blocks this turn if able. You may have it gain reach until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "I'll show you original research, you hack!"

data.name: Academic Probation
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Choose a nonland card name. Opponents can't cast spells with the chosen name until your next turn.
• Choose target nonland permanent. Until your next turn, it can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

data.name: Access Tunnel
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}: Target creature with power 3 or less can't be blocked this turn.
data.flavor_text: Oriq agents stick to the dark corners of Arcavios, unseen yet ever-present.

data.name: Accomplished Alchemist
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
data.flavor_text: "Tincture of murkroot and lizard feet? Simple. One that doesn't take like murkroot and lizard feet? I'm working on it."

data.name: Aether Helix
data.oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand. Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Some Quandrix mages prefer to study at twilight, watching their experimental equations trace glowing trails against the encroaching darkness.

data.name: Ageless Guardian
data.flavor_text: Ancient ruins dot the world of Arcavios, most older than Strixhaven itself and many still guarded by soldiers from the Blood Age, centuries after their deaths.

data.name: Arcane Subtraction
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: The class learned little that day.

data.name: Archmage Emeritus
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Some emeritus professors return from their wanderings periodically to share tales of the mystical wonders of Arcavios.

data.name: Archway Commons
data.oracle_text:
Archway Commons enters the battlefield tapped.
When Archway Commons enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

data.name: Ardent Dustspeaker
data.oracle_text: Whenever Ardent Dustspeaker attacks, you may put an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on the bottom of your library. If you do, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
data.flavor_text: "The Founder Dragons weren't even hatched when this scroll was written!"

data.name: Arrogant Poet
data.oracle_text: Whenever Arrogant Poet attacks, you may pay 2 life. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "I would be kinder to my peers, Professor, but I simply don't have any."

card_faces.name: Augmenter Pugilist
card_faces.oracle_text:
Trample
As long as you control eight or more lands, Augmenter Pugilist gets +5/+5.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Hold still. I have a theory about what's about to happen to your face."

card_faces.name: Echoing Equation
card_faces.oracle_text: Choose target creature you control. Each other creature you control becomes a copy of it until end of turn, except those creatures aren't legendary if the chosen creature is legendary.

data.name: Baleful Mastery
data.oracle_text:
You may pay {1}{B} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {1}{B} cost was paid, an opponent draws a card.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.

data.name: Basic Conjuration
data.oracle_text: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: "I made that! It's mine! Did you see that?"

data.name: Bayou Groff
data.oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}.
data.flavor_text:
"Groffs are great for tracking pests through the muck, but securing the pests before the groff devours them is a dicey endeavor."
—Lisette, Witherbloom dean

data.name: Beaming Defiance
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
data.flavor_text:
"I've lived too long in my father's shadow. It's time to find my own light."
—Killian, Silverquill mage-student

data.name: Beledros Witherbloom
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Pay 10 life: Untap all lands you control. Activate only once each turn.

data.name: Biblioplex Assistant
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Biblioplex Assistant enters the battlefield, put up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard on top of your library.
data.flavor_text:
"I appreciate the help, and honestly, it's very entertaining."
—Isabough of the Biblioplex

data.name: Big Play
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.
data.flavor_text:
"Quandrix is running out of time. If they're going to capture the Witherbloom mascot, they need something big here."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

data.name: Biomathematician
data.oracle_text: When Biomathematician enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on each Fractal you control.
data.flavor_text: "I will reach infinity."

data.name: Blade Historian
data.oracle_text: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.
data.flavor_text: "So you see, the reckless battle strategy of the Kathorran orcs was effective, but ultimately proved to be a double-edged sword. As did their double-edged swords."

data.name: Blex, Vexing Pest // Search for Blex

card_faces.name: Blex, Vexing Pest
card_faces.oracle_text:
Other Pests, Bats, Insects, Snakes, and Spiders you control get +1/+1.
When Blex, Vexing Pest dies, you gain 4 life.
card_faces.flavor_text: Pests are typically harvested before they outgrow their enclosures. Blex is far from typical.

card_faces.name: Search for Blex
card_faces.oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may put any number of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. You lose 3 life for each card you put into your hand this way.

data.name: Blood Age General
data.oracle_text: {T}: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: His troops took the Fortress of Caerdoon centuries ago, yet he fights on.

data.name: Blood Researcher
data.oracle_text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Researcher.
data.flavor_text: "Dean Valentin warns us not to consume the samples for our safety, but I think he's just being greedy."

data.name: Blot Out the Sky
data.oracle_text: Create X tapped 2/1 white and black Inkling creature tokens with flying. If X is 6 or more, destroy all noncreature, nonland permanents.
data.flavor_text: A drop of ink is a nuisance. A torrent of inklings is a menace.

data.name: Body of Research
data.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your library.
data.flavor_text: Needledeep had promised that his final project would be his biggest one yet.

data.name: Bookwurm
data.oracle_text:
Trample
When Bookwurm enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
{2}{G}: Put Bookwurm from your graveyard into your library third from the top.
data.flavor_text: It takes "devouring a book in one sitting" to a frightening extreme.

data.name: Brackish Trudge
data.oracle_text:
Brackish Trudge enters the battlefield tapped.
{1}{B}: Return Brackish Trudge from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you gained life this turn.
data.flavor_text: Most trudges are covered with decaying plant matter, making them ideal breeding grounds for fungal spores.

data.name: Burrog Befuddler
data.oracle_text:
Flash
When Burrog Befuddler enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Students who seek river herbs in Doradur quickly find themselves slightly damp and thoroughly surrounded.

data.name: Bury in Books
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets an attacking creature.
Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.
data.flavor_text: There are no weapons allowed in the Biblioplex, but a clever mage is never truly defenseless.

data.name: Callous Bloodmage
data.oracle_text:
When Callous Bloodmage enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
• You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
• Exile target player's graveyard.

data.name: Campus Guide
data.oracle_text: When Campus Guide enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
data.flavor_text: "There's nowhere in Strixhaven I can't find. Where do you need to go?"

data.name: Charge Through
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"What a move! Lorehold gets caught flat-footed, and Witherbloom barrels ahead."
—Cremik, Mage Tower commentator

data.name: Clever Lumimancer
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Clever Lumimancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "You're too dim to realize it, but you've already lost."

data.name: Closing Statement
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast during your end step.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker you don't control. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "In conclusion . . ."

data.name: Codie, Vociferous Codex
data.oracle_text:
You can't cast permanent spells.
{4}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. When you cast your next spell this turn, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an instant or sorcery card with lesser mana value. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put each other card exiled this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

data.name: Cogwork Archivist
data.oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
data.flavor_text:
"It's the largest library in the Multiverse. Of course it has the largest librarians."
—Kasmina

data.name: Combat Professor
data.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains vigilance until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Before Yovus was cut down at Pranticle Peak, she performed which maneuver? Anyone? From the reading?"

data.name: Confront the Past
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Remove twice X loyalty counters from target planeswalker an opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: "Why, Gideon? Of all people, why save me?"

data.name: Conspiracy Theorist
data.oracle_text:
Whenever Conspiracy Theorist attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard one or more nonland cards, you may exile one of them from your graveyard. If you do, you may cast it this turn.

data.name: Containment Breach
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If its mana value is 2 or less, create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
data.flavor_text: For pest keepers, there's no sound more disheartening than breaking glass.

data.name: Crackle with Power
data.oracle_text: Crackle with Power deals five times X damage to each of up to X targets.
data.flavor_text: Will gasped as Rowan drew from the raw power of the Strixhaven Snarl. For a moment, she was luminous, transcendent, terrible.

data.name: Cram Session
data.oracle_text:
You gain 4 life.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: The only thing more delicious than a top grade is Gyome's signature cake.

data.name: Creative Outburst
data.oracle_text:
Creative Outburst deals 5 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Creative Outburst: Create a Treasure token.

data.name: Crushing Disappointment
data.oracle_text: Each player loses 2 life. You draw two cards.
data.flavor_text: Most students could barely endure Dean Embrose's scrutiny for a semester or two; Killian lived with it his entire life.

data.name: Culling Ritual
data.oracle_text: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less. Add {B} or {G} for each permanent destroyed this way.
data.flavor_text: "Your own frailty is your undoing. I am merely the one to expose it."

data.name: Culmination of Studies
data.oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. For each land card exiled this way, create a Treasure token. For each blue card exiled this way, draw a card. For each red card exiled this way, Culmination of Studies deals 1 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: Will's quick thinking meshed with Rowan's raw power to bring down the Blood Avatar.

data.name: Curate
data.oracle_text:
Look at the top two cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "*Kathorran War Chants, Vol. III*? That doesn't even belong in this wing!"

data.name: Daemogoth Titan
data.oracle_text: Whenever Daemogoth Titan attacks or blocks, sacrifice a creature.
data.flavor_text:
"Of course it offered you power. Demons always do. But trust me—the sweeter the prize, the more ruinous the price."
—Professor Onyx

data.name: Daemogoth Woe-Eater
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a creature.
When you sacrifice Daemogoth Woe-Eater, each opponent discards a card, you draw a card, and you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: "Your pain for my wisdom. You'll get no better deal."

data.name: Deadly Brew
data.oracle_text: Each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If you sacrificed a permanent this way, you may return another permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: No one ever asked what was in Dina's concoctions, so long as they worked.

data.name: Decisive Denial
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {3}.
data.flavor_text: "I've heard enough."

data.name: Defend the Campus
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
data.flavor_text: Professors scrambled to push the mage hunters back, leaving the heart of Strixhaven undefended.

data.name: Detention Vortex
data.oracle_text:
Enchant nonland permanent
Enchanted permanent can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
{3}: Destroy Detention Vortex. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only as a sorcery.

data.name: Devastating Mastery
data.oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{W}{W} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{W}{W} cost was paid, an opponent chooses up to two nonland permanents they control and returns them to their owner's hand.
Destroy all nonland permanents.

data.name: Devouring Tendrils
data.oracle_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control. When the permanent you don't control dies this turn, you gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: Witherbloom spells often take on the appearance—and personality—of their components.

data.name: Dina, Soul Steeper
data.oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, each opponent loses 1 life.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Dina, Soul Steeper gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

data.name: Divide by Zero
data.oracle_text:
Return target spell or permanent with mana value 1 or greater to its owner's hand.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "Misery. Inadequacy. Failure. The common denominator is you."

data.name: Double Major
data.oracle_text: Copy target creature spell you control, except it isn't legendary if the spell is legendary. (A copy of a creature spell becomes a token.)
data.flavor_text: "Now I can dedicate myself fully to zoetimancy and void theory!"

data.name: Draconic Intervention
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
Draconic Intervention deals X damage to each non-Dragon creature, where X is the exiled card's mana value. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Exile Draconic Intervention.

data.name: Dragon's Approach
data.oracle_text:
Dragon's Approach deals 3 damage to each opponent. You may exile Dragon's Approach and four cards named Dragon's Approach from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named Dragon's Approach.

data.name: Dragonsguard Elite
data.oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Dragonsguard Elite.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Dragonsguard Elite.
data.flavor_text: "The Founder Dragons brought the Blood Age to an end. It is an honor to serve them."

data.name: Dramatic Finale
data.oracle_text:
Creature tokens you control get +1/+1.
Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control die, create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying. This ability triggers only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: The enraptured audience barely noticed their programs were suddenly blank.

data.name: Dream Strix
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Dream Strix becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.
When Dream Strix dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

data.name: Dueling Coach
data.oracle_text:
When Dueling Coach enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
{4}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

data.name: Eager First-Year
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Eager First-Year gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Today, she learns the basics. She'll knock out advanced theory later this week.

data.name: Ecological Appreciation
data.oracle_text: Search your library and graveyard for up to four creature cards with different names that each have mana value X or less and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Shuffle the chosen cards into your library and put the rest onto the battlefield. Exile Ecological Appreciation.

preview.source: クロタカ統率者[EDH]チャンネル

data.name: Efreet Flamepainter
data.oracle_text:
Double strike
Whenever Efreet Flamepainter deals combat damage to a player, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

data.name: Elemental Expressionist
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, choose target creature you control. Until end of turn, it gains "If this creature would leave the battlefield, exile it instead of putting it anywhere else" and "When this creature is put into exile, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token." (Each instance of that ability triggers separately.)

data.name: Elemental Masterpiece
data.oracle_text:
Create two 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature tokens.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Elemental Masterpiece: Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
data.flavor_text: Rootha passed with flying, living colors.

data.name: Elemental Summoning
data.oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"You've made a splash. Now show me a torrent."
—Uvilda, Prismari dean

data.name: Elite Spellbinder
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Elite Spellbinder enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.
data.flavor_text: Paulo Vitor Damo da Rosa, World Champion XXVI

data.name: Emergent Sequence
data.oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. That land becomes a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature that's still a land. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each land you had enter the battlefield under your control this turn.

data.name: Enthusiastic Study
data.oracle_text:
Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "If the pen is mightier than the sword, just think what a giant tome could do!"

data.name: Environmental Sciences
data.oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: First-years quickly learn how the Vastlands earned its name.

data.name: Essence Infusion
data.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "I'd say it's still a fair fight—now my friend is about the size of your ego."

data.name: Eureka Moment
data.oracle_text: Draw two cards. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
data.flavor_text: "At first, the equations were simply numbers. But in those numbers, I saw a story, and in that story I saw a pattern, and suddenly it all fit together!"

data.name: Excavated Wall
data.oracle_text:
Defender
{1}, {T}: Mill a card. (Put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
data.flavor_text:
"Don't be fooled by the quiet. These old stones are trying to talk to you."
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

data.name: Exhilarating Elocution
data.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: His words poured forth on waves of golden light, scouring all fear from his audience's hearts and minds.

data.name: Expanded Anatomy
data.oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. It gains vigilance until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "Changing the equation from incremental to exponential was a stroke of genius on my part."

data.name: Expel
data.oracle_text: Exile target tapped creature.
data.flavor_text: Quintorius was a daydreamer, far happier digging through history books than practicing battle tactics. He agreed with the military academy on only one thing: he did not belong in their ranks.

data.name: Explosive Welcome
data.oracle_text: Explosive Welcome deals 5 damage to any target and 3 damage to any other target. Add {R}{R}{R}.
data.flavor_text: Rowan and Will were a natural fit in Prismari College, the school of outrageous elemental arts.

data.name: Exponential Growth
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, double target creature's power X times.
data.flavor_text: Most Quandrix students fundamentally disagree with the concept of "enough."

data.name: Expressive Iteration
data.oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, put one of them on the bottom of your library, and exile one of them. You may play the exiled card this turn.
data.flavor_text: Prismari students dance in the tension between passion and perfection.

data.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord // Awaken the Blood Avatar

card_faces.name: Extus, Oriq Overlord
card_faces.oracle_text:
Double strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, return target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Join me for the dawn of a new age."

card_faces.name: Awaken the Blood Avatar
card_faces.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature sacrificed this way.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Create a 3/6 black and red Avatar creature token with haste and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 3 damage to each opponent."

Flying
When Eyetwitch dies, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Oculomancers see the ideal potion ingredient. The bats don't see it that way.

data.name: Fervent Mastery
data.oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{R}{R} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{R}{R} cost was paid, an opponent discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Search your library for up to three cards, put them into your hand, shuffle, then discard three cards at random.

data.name: Field Trip
data.oracle_text:
Search your library for a basic Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

data.name: First Day of Class
data.oracle_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains haste until end of turn.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

card_faces.name: Flamescroll Celebrant
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent activates an ability that isn't a mana ability, Flamescroll Celebrant deals 1 damage to that player.
{1}{R}: Flamescroll Celebrant gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card_faces.name: Revel in Silence
card_faces.oracle_text:
Your opponents can't cast spells or activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities this turn.
Exile Revel in Silence.

data.name: Flunk
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 7 minus the number of cards in that creature's controller's hand.
data.flavor_text:
"I assure you, no one fails my course more than once."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

data.name: Fortifying Draught
data.oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the amount of life you gained this turn.
data.flavor_text: "If a seedling can push through solid stone, there's no limit to what I could do."

data.name: Fractal Summoning
data.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
data.flavor_text:
"Fractals are just pseudo-dimensional manifestations of asynchronous biosymmetries. It's really quite simple."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

data.name: Fracture
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text:
"Your defiance is amusing, little mage. It's time you learn how fragile you really are."
—Extus Narr

data.name: Frostboil Snarl
data.oracle_text:
As Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Frostboil Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
data.flavor_text: A smoldering storm of chilling fire.

data.name: Frost Trickster
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Frost Trickster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
data.flavor_text: The most important skill in a Mage Tower match is keeping one's cool.

data.name: Fuming Effigy
data.oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, Fuming Effigy deals 1 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: Some spirits share ancient wisdom. Others just get mad you touched their stuff.

data.name: Furycalm Snarl
data.oracle_text:
As Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, Furycalm Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
data.flavor_text: A seething locus of reverent rage.

data.name: Galazeth Prismari
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Galazeth Prismari enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token.
Artifacts you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell."

data.name: Gnarled Professor
data.oracle_text:
Trample
When Gnarled Professor enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "Class is in season."

data.name: Go Blank
data.oracle_text: Target player discards two cards. Then exile all cards from that player's graveyard.
data.flavor_text: The only feeling worse than not knowing the answer is the certainty that you once did.

data.name: Golden Ratio
data.oracle_text: Draw a card for each different power among creatures you control.
data.flavor_text:
"When I look around, I see a world defined by patterns that still manages to defy them."
—Kianne, Quandrix dean

data.name: Grinning Ignus
data.oracle_text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: On rare occasions, a Prismari student will summon an elemental that shows such promise that it's permitted to stay and enroll.

data.name: Guiding Voice
data.oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: When honormancers work together, their compliments are complementary.

data.name: Hall Monitor
data.oracle_text:
Haste
{1}{R}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: "No unauthorized summoning. No writing in the library books. And absolutely no indoor dueling!"

data.name: Hall of Oracles
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn.

data.name: Harness Infinity
data.oracle_text:
Exchange your hand and graveyard.
Exile Harness Infinity.
data.flavor_text:
"As I stepped into the star arch, it all became perfectly clear. Life and death are not opposites, but an endless path, twisting around and back upon itself, never ending and never beginning."
—Zhaer, professor of biophilosophy

data.name: Heated Debate
data.oracle_text:
This spell can't be countered. (This includes by the ward ability.)
Heated Debate deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: "While you were wasting time with abstract equations, I mastered ancient Oggyar fire magic. Your move."

data.name: Hofri Ghostforge
data.oracle_text:
Spirits you control get +1/+1 and have trample and haste.
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to its owner's graveyard."

data.name: Honor Troll
data.oracle_text:
Vigilance
If you would gain life, you gain that much life plus 1 instead.
Honor Troll gets +2/+1 as long as you have 25 or more life.
data.flavor_text: First in his clan to attend Strixhaven, and now first in his class.

data.name: Humiliate
data.oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
data.flavor_text: "Aw, what's that? No comeback?"

data.name: Hunt for Specimens
data.oracle_text:
Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

data.name: Igneous Inspiration
data.oracle_text:
Igneous Inspiration deals 3 damage to any target.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: Prismari fosters a burning need to create.

data.name: Illuminate History
data.oracle_text: Discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards. Then if there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
data.flavor_text: "Look at the detail in this stonework! Professor, our assumptions about early Kathorran tool use may not be correct."

data.name: Illustrious Historian
data.oracle_text: {5}, Exile Illustrious Historian from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
data.flavor_text: The most distinguished Lorehold professors are eligible to receive extended tenure, even beyond the limits of their own mortality.

data.name: Infuse with Vitality
data.oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target creature gains deathtouch and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
You gain 2 life.
data.flavor_text: Dina raised her cup to Killian's lips, and for the first time in his life, he knew compassion.

data.name: Ingenious Mastery
data.oracle_text:
You may pay {2}{U} rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
If the {2}{U} cost was paid, you draw three cards, then an opponent creates two Treasure tokens and they scry 2. If that cost wasn't paid, you draw X cards.

data.name: Inkling Summoning
data.oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying.
data.flavor_text:
"Think of an insult so vicious, so vulgar, that you hesitate to speak it aloud. The strongest, most aggressive inklings are born from such scorn."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

data.name: Introduction to Annihilation
data.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller draws a card.
data.flavor_text:
"I've never seen a student fail quite so spectacularly. There's potential in that."
—Hostram, professor of arcanochemistry

data.name: Introduction to Prophecy
data.oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Final grades are posted on the first day of class.

data.name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios // Journey to the Oracle

card_faces.name: Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios
card_faces.oracle_text:
Discard a card: Return Jadzi, Oracle of Arcavios to its owner's hand.
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield.

card_faces.name: Journey to the Oracle
card_faces.oracle_text: You may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Then if you control eight or more lands, you may discard a card. If you do, return Journey to the Oracle to its owner's hand.
card_faces.flavor_text: To find Jadzi, one need only wander.

data.name: Karok Wrangler
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"She showed up to class on a what?"
—Valentin, Witherbloom Dean

data.name: Kasmina, Enigma Sage
data.oracle_text:
Each other planeswalker you control has the loyalty abilities of Kasmina, Enigma Sage.
+2: Scry 1.
−X: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it.
−8: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a color with this planeswalker, exile that card, then shuffle. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.

data.name: Kelpie Guide
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Untap another target permanent you control.
{T}: Tap target permanent. Activate only if you control eight or more lands.
data.flavor_text: Kelpies are drawn to paradoxes, making them ideal companions for Quandrix mages.

data.name: Kianne, Dean of Substance // Imbraham, Dean of Theory
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Elf Druid // Legendary Creature — Bird Wizard

card_faces.name: Kianne, Dean of Substance
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Exile the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put a study counter on it.
{4}{G}: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put a +1/+1 counter on it for each different mana value among nonland cards you own in exile with study counters on them.

card_faces.name: Imbraham, Dean of Theory
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
{X}{U}{U}, {T}: Exile the top X cards of your library and put a study counter on each of them. Then you may put a card you own in exile with a study counter on it into your hand.

all_parts.name: Kianne, Dean of Substance // Imbraham, Dean of Theory
all_parts.type_line: Legendary Creature — Elf Druid // Legendary Creature — Bird Wizard

data.name: Killian, Ink Duelist
data.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Spells you cast that target a creature cost {2} less to cast.
data.flavor_text: "When your father is Dean Embrose, second best really isn't an option."

data.name: Lash of Malice
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"The strongest shadow spells come from disdain for someone else, not frustration with yourself."
—Embrose, Silverquill dean

data.name: Leech Fanatic
data.oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Leech Fanatic has lifelink.
data.flavor_text: "Everyone thinks that leeches maintain a strictly sanguivorous diet, but in fact, most freshwater leeches are carnivores. Wait, where are you going?"

data.name: Leonin Lightscribe
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: All who hear his inspiring words are filled with hope and pride.

data.name: Letter of Acceptance
data.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Letter of Acceptance: Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: The letter unfolded, inviting the twins to Strixhaven. Will saw a chance for arcane study. Rowan saw a chance for power.

data.name: Leyline Invocation
data.oracle_text: Create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of lands you control.
data.flavor_text:
"Do you still believe my work is nothing but dry, boring equations?"
—Cairu, Quandrix mage-student

data.name: Lorehold Apprentice
data.oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, Spirit creatures you control gain "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to each opponent."
data.flavor_text: Ancient footfalls echo in her head, their timeless rhythm guiding the present.

data.name: Lorehold Campus
data.oracle_text:
Lorehold Campus enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
{4}, {T}: Scry 1.
data.flavor_text: Mage-students obsessed with the secrets of the past choose Lorehold, the college of archaeomancy.

data.name: Lorehold Command
data.oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible and haste until end of turn.
• Lorehold Command deals 3 damage to any target. Target player gains 3 life.
• Sacrifice a permanent, then draw two cards.

data.name: Lorehold Excavation
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, mill a card. If a land card was milled this way, you gain 1 life. Otherwise, Lorehold Excavation deals 1 damage to each opponent. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
{5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.

data.name: Lorehold Pledgemage
data.oracle_text:
First strike
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Lorehold Pledgemage gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: "The weight of history can empower you or it can crush you. It's your choice."

data.name: Maelstrom Muse
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Maelstrom Muse attacks, the next instant or sorcery spell you cast this turn costs {X} less to cast, where X is Maelstrom Muse's power as this ability resolves.
data.flavor_text: She's an inspiration to everyone, even herself.

data.name: Mage Duel
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've cast another instant or sorcery spell this turn.
Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. Then it fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
data.flavor_text: "Remember the rules. No spells to the face!"

data.name: Mage Hunter
data.oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts or copies an instant or sorcery spell, they lose 1 life.
data.flavor_text: One of the Oriq's most powerful tools is the mage hunter, a vile monstrosity created to seek out and snuff out the arcane.

data.name: Mage Hunters' Onslaught
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
Whenever a creature blocks this turn, its controller loses 1 life.
data.flavor_text: Extus stood before his alma mater for a moment, remembering first his studies, then his vengeance. At his command, the mage hunters unfolded.

data.name: Magma Opus
data.oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

data.name: Make Your Mark
data.oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
data.flavor_text: Those who do learn from history may still choose to repeat it.

data.name: Manifestation Sage
data.oracle_text: When Manifestation Sage enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 green and blue Fractal creature token. Put X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
data.flavor_text: The first thing a Quandrix mage learns is the laws of metaphysics. The second thing is how to break them.

data.name: Mascot Exhibition
data.oracle_text: Create a 2/1 white and black Inkling creature token with flying, a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token, and a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
data.flavor_text:
"Don't just win the game. Win the crowd."
—Moriana, Mage Tower coach

data.name: Mascot Interception
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature token.
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Far from the trappings of royalty, Rowan and Will found inspiration from the most popular sport on campus, Mage Tower.

data.name: Master Symmetrist
data.oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever a creature you control with power equal to its toughness attacks, it gains trample until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Tondo lost his very first duel and has spent his entire life trying to get even.

data.name: Mavinda, Students' Advocate
data.oracle_text:
Flying
{0}: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that spell doesn't target a creature you control, it costs {8} more to cast this way. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead. Activate only once each turn. (You still pay the spell's costs. Timing rules for the spell still apply.)

data.name: Mentor's Guidance
data.oracle_text:
When you cast this spell, copy it if you control a planeswalker, Cleric, Druid, Shaman, Warlock, or Wizard.
Scry 1, then draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Kasmina had encouraged the twins to apply. Strixhaven would test not only their magical potential, but also their character.

data.name: Mercurial Transformation
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent loses all abilities and becomes your choice of a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1 or a blue Octopus creature with base power and toughness 4/4.
data.flavor_text: "For sun's sake, I just want a crab!"

data.name: Mila, Crafty Companion // Lukka, Wayward Bonder
data.type_line: Legendary Creature — Fox // Legendary Planeswalker — Lukka

card_faces.name: Mila, Crafty Companion
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent attacks one or more planeswalkers you control, put a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.
Whenever a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

card_faces.name: Lukka, Wayward Bonder
card_faces.oracle_text:
+1: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If a creature card was discarded this way, draw two cards instead.
−2: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of your next upkeep.
−7: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, it deals damage equal to its power to any target."

all_parts.name: Mila, Crafty Companion // Lukka, Wayward Bonder
all_parts.type_line: Legendary Creature — Fox // Legendary Planeswalker — Lukka

data.name: Moldering Karok
data.oracle_text: Trample, lifelink
data.flavor_text: Necroluminescence is common among the undead creatures of Sedgemoor, giving the midnight swamp an eerie glow. It's comforting—from a distance.

data.name: Mortality Spear
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you gained life this turn.
Destroy target nonland permanent.
data.flavor_text: "Death is my life's work."

data.name: Multiple Choice
data.oracle_text:
If X is 1, scry 1, then draw a card.
If X is 2, you may choose a player. They return a creature they control to its owner's hand.
If X is 3, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.
If X is 4 or more, do all of the above.

data.name: Necroblossom Snarl
data.oracle_text:
As Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Forest card from your hand. If you don't, Necroblossom Snarl enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
data.flavor_text: A hungry lair of flourishing rot.

data.name: Necrotic Fumes
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature you control.
Exile target creature or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: When live specimens aren't readily available, Witherbloom mages make creative use of ragged spirits clinging to long-dead bodies.

data.name: Needlethorn Drake
data.oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch
data.flavor_text: As they learn to fly, young drakes have a tendency to accidentally impale trees, cliffs, and unsuspecting students.

data.name: Novice Dissector
data.oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: "The professor said to first extract the venom glands, then the acid sac. Next up, the . . . meeping organ?"

data.name: Oggyar Battle-Seer
data.oracle_text:
Haste
{T}: Scry 1.
data.flavor_text: "May Ganathog bless us with bloody visions of glory restored!"

data.name: Oriq Loremage
data.oracle_text: {T}: Search your library for a card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle. If it's an instant or sorcery card, put a +1/+1 counter on Oriq Loremage.
data.flavor_text: Nothing can quell the Oriq's thirst for the forbidden secrets of the past.

data.name: Overgrown Arch
data.oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{2}, Sacrifice Overgrown Arch: Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)

data.name: Owlin Shieldmage
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Ward—Pay 3 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)
data.flavor_text: "Aim higher next time."

card_faces.name: Pestilent Cauldron
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 black and green Pest creature token with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
{1}, {T}: Each opponent mills cards equal to the amount of life you gained this turn.
{4}, {T}: Exile four target cards from a single graveyard. Draw a card.

card_faces.name: Restorative Burst
card_faces.oracle_text: Return up to two target creature, land, and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Each player gains 4 life. Exile Restorative Burst.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Death? Everyone does death. Let me show you something actually impressive."

data.name: Pest Summoning
data.oracle_text: Create two 1/1 black and green Pest creature tokens with "When this creature dies, you gain 1 life."
data.flavor_text:
"Step 1: Put the pests in mud.
"Step 2: Wait."
—*Gyome's Guide to Pest Breeding*

data.name: Pigment Storm
data.oracle_text: Pigment Storm deals 5 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
data.flavor_text: When art projects collapse, Prismari students revel in the beauty of destruction. Everyone else runs for cover.

data.name: Pilgrim of the Ages
data.oracle_text:
When Pilgrim of the Ages enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{6}: Return Pilgrim of the Ages from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Pillardrop Rescuer
data.oracle_text:
Flying
When Pillardrop Rescuer enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
data.flavor_text: Gentle hands of stone whisk the careless from the crumbling ruins of Pillardrop.

data.name: Pillardrop Warden
data.oracle_text:
Reach
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Pillardrop Warden: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only as a sorcery.
data.flavor_text: A giant statue of a dwarf is still a giant statue.

card_faces.name: Plargg, Dean of Chaos
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
{4}{R}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary, nonland card with mana value 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card_faces.name: Augusta, Dean of Order
card_faces.oracle_text:
Other tapped creatures you control get +1/+0.
Other untapped creatures you control get +0/+1.
Whenever you attack, untap each creature you control, then tap any number of creatures you control.

data.name: Plumb the Forbidden
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice one or more creatures. When you do, copy this spell for each creature sacrificed this way.
You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
data.flavor_text: Strixhaven forbade all magic from the Blood Age, so that is where Extus began his research.

data.name: Poet's Quill
Pop Quiz
data.oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
data.flavor_text: "Today is hydromancy? I thought it was amplimancy! I studied for amplimancy!"
